properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 5 at 9:04AM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas 6 to 11 ft possible.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
